headline: Oppenheimer Raises PT on Citigroup Inc. (C) to $124; Maintains ‘Outperform’ Rating
summary: Citigroup Inc. (NYSE:C) is included in our list of the 10 Most Undervalued Value Stocks to Buy Now. On July 16, 2025, Oppenheimer raised its price target on Citigroup Inc. (NYSE:C) from $107 to $123. This price revision followed the company’s strong Q2 earnings. The target increase was attributed to stronger-than-expected core revenue of $21.8 […]
